mapper.insert: insert into student (STU_CD, GRADE, STU_SEMESTER, ADM_DATE, NATION, TL_TRY_COUNT, ACA_STATE_CD, COMPANY_CD, CLUB_CD, SEC_CD, NAME, ENAME, PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADD1, ADD2, EMAIL, BANK_NAME, ACC_HOLDER, ACC_NUM, BIRTHDAY) values (#{stuCd},1,1,#{admDate},#{nation},0,'attend','none','none','none',#{name},#{ename},#{phone},#{zipcode},#{add1},#{add2},#{email},#{bankName},#{accHolder},#{accNum},#{birthday})
insert into stu_major (stu_major_cd, stu_id, major_cd, maj_class_cd) values (#{stuMajorCd},#{stuCd},(select major_cd from major where major_name=#{majorName}),1)
mapper.select: select col_cd, col_name from college order by col_cd

select a.col_name, b.major_name, d.name,d.stu_cd, d.grade, d.birthday, d.phone, d.email, comm_cd_func('acaStateCd',d.aca_state_cd) as aca_state_cd from college a, major b, stu_major c, student d where b.major_cd = c.major_cd and c.stu_id = d.stu_cd and a.col_cd = b.college_cd
select count(*) from student where stu_cd is not null
